## BrowserContext.isIncognito() method

Returns whether BrowserContext is incognito. The default browser context is the only non-incognito browser context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isIncognito(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

## Remarks

The default browser context cannot be closed.
